reuters.title: WEINBERGER SAYS U.S. FORCES ATTACKED IRANIAN OIL PLATFORM
reuters.body: Shamrock Capital LP said it has completed the sale of Cental Soya Co Inc to Ferruzzi Agricola Finanziaria the holding company for the Ferruzzi group of Ravenna, Italy. Shamrock Capital is a limited partnership led by Shamrock Holdings Inc the Roy E. Disney family company. Under the agreement announced last month, Ferruzzi acquired all the equity and assumed subordinated term debt of about 195 mln dlrs in a trction valued at about 370 mln dlrs. Reuter 
